sentences.sContent: His business went under because of competition from the large corporations.
sentences.sContent_eng: His business went under because of competition from the large corporations.
sentences.sCn: 由于大公司的竞争，他的生意陷入了困境。

sentences.sContent: There were fewer temporary engineers to plug in in that city because of low pay.
sentences.sContent_eng: There were fewer temporary engineers to plug in in that city because of low pay.
sentences.sCn: 由于报酬低，该城市雇用得到的临时工程师就更少了。

sentences.sContent: Many species are in peril of extinction because of our destruction of their natural habitat.
sentences.sContent_eng: Many species are in peril of extinction because of our destruction of their natural habitat.
sentences.sCn: 许多物种由于我们破坏了它们的自然环境， 现在正面临灭绝的危险。
